mapper.sql: id, money, invoice_type, invoice_header, contacts, cellphone, address, invoice_state, remark, create_date, update_date, user_id
mapper.insert: insert into tb_invoice (id, money, invoice_type, invoice_header, contacts, cellphone, address, invoice_state, remark, create_date, update_date, user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invoiceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoiceHeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tb_invoice (money, invoice_type, invoice_header, contacts, cellphone, address, invoice_state, remark, create_date, update_date, user_id) values (#{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invoiceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{invoiceHeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update tb_invoice
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
invoice_type = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invoice_header = #{invoiceHeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoice_state = #{invoiceState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_invoice set money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, invoice_header = #{invoiceHeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cellphone = #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice_state = #{invoiceState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select i.id, i.money, i.invoice_type, i.invoice_header, i.address, i.invoice_state, i.remark, i.create_date from tb_invoice i where user_id = #{userId} order by create_date desc
select i.id, i.money, i.invoice_type, i.invoice_header, i.contacts, i.cellphone, i.address, i.invoice_state, i.remark, i.create_date, i.update_date, i.user_id from tb_invoice i where i.id = #{id}
